creatures

Class Monster

  • java.lang.Object
    • creatures.Monster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Creatures
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BossFive, BossFour, BossOne, BossThree, BossTwo, Ghoul, Giant, Goblin, Golem, Hobgoblin, Ogre, Orc, Skeleton, Zombie

    public abstract class Monster
extends java.lang.Object
implements Creatures
    Class used to create Monster classes. Uses the Creatures interface.
    Version:
    1,0
    Author:
    Henrik Hagstr√∂m

      • takeDmg

        public void takeDmg(int dmg)
        Description copied from interface: Creatures
        Damage taken from enemy creature. Reduces creature currentHp by (dmg - toughness), and - Amulet modifier for players.
        Specified by:
        takeDmg in interface Creatures

      • roar

        public void roar()
